options.content: Vis√£o Geral - 4 Golden Signals
Latency

targets.expr: sum by(uri, method) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", status=~"2.*", uri=~"/v1/persons.*"}) / sum by(uri, method) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", uri=~"/v1/persons.*"})

sum by(uri, method)(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", uri=~"/v1/persons.*"}) / sum by(uri, method)(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", uri=~"/v1/persons.*"})

sum by(uri, method) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", status=~"5.*", uri=~"/v1/persons.*"}) / sum by(uri, method) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", uri=~"/v1/persons.*"})
topk(10, max (max_over_time(http_server_requests_seconds_max{application="$application", uri=~"/v1/persons.*"}[$__range])) by(uri, outcome, method))

sum by(uri, outcome, method) (
    increase(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", uri=~"/v1/persons.*"}[$__range])
)
/ 
sum by(uri, outcome, method) (
    increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", uri=~"/v1/persons.*"}[$__range])
)

options.content: Traffic
Error

targets.expr:
label_replace(
    sum by (method, uri, exception, status) (
        increase(
            http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", status=~"5..|400|404|499"}[$__range]
        )
    ) > 0, 
    'uri', 
    '$1/*$2', 
    'uri', 
    '(.*)\\/\\{.+\\}(.*)'
)

options.content: Saturation
